/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. On either side of the highway, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. In the distance, power lines stretch across the scene, a common sight in many cities. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of urban development and natural beauty.
